title: Rank Flex
body:
Riot u seriously make a good part on putting players together, bronze with plats and gold top job with the matching..................


Can riot fix this...........  at least make bronze silver and low tier gold together not high gold and plat wtf

replies.body: Flex is new its gonna have these issues for awhile... just avoid the queue for a bit they will fix it or remove it (more likely  remove it on oce)......

> [{quoted}](name=Roguestoney,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=Rd4AZXlE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-24T11:18:45.143+0000)
>
> Flex is new its gonna have these issues for awhile... just avoid the queue for a bit they will fix it or remove it (more likely  remove it on oce)......

Basically this (despite the spelling errors, you have autocorrect messing you up there Stoney?). Since Flex is a new queue everyone's MMR will be set to a "standard" (generally around Silver 5 MMR) so you'll likely be matched with higher ranked players while everyone works their way back to where they should be. If I remember correctly, in the case of the recent changes to ranked queues Riot did adjust people's MMRs slightly based on their previous rankings. I honestly wouldn't be surprised if Riot decided to restrict Flex more heavily on OCE or even remove it altogether to "combat" queue health issues.
Lol sry too many wines with the wife. I will fix it now...

> [{quoted}](name=Roguestoney,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=Rd4AZXlE,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-12-24T11:39:27.801+0000)
>
> Lol sry too many wines with the wife. I will fix it now...

A LoL player with a wife?

Now I've seen everything...
Hah yeah man she is sitting next tom me right now... i would like to add you and play some time if thats okay with you?
Yeh, definitely. Though I don't know when that might happen at the moment, still got my pup taking up most of my time.
Nice i have a Border Collie. They are great dogs. :^)
